channel.title: How can i make it allow 2 connectiong form ip and not 2 look plz
channel.description:
So i got this (form delta) [code] for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect",connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }[/code]
how i make it allow 2 connections ?
